title: Deck of battle
data:
{{obsolete}}

The '''deck of battle''' is an [[Decks#Archetype_decks|archetype deck]] that is not found as an independent item in the game. 

==History==
Archetype decks were removed when decks were greatly simplified and made exclusive to [[Nemelex]] in [[0.19]].

*[[Cards]]
*[[Decks]]
